channel.title: projects on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in projects on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: ongoing projects
item.description: my current research consists of: Globally optimal hierarchical clustering through linear programming (Willemsen, R., Cavicchia, C., van den Heuvel, W. and van de Velden, M.) Convex Clustering of Mixed Numerical and Categorical Data (Brink, T. and Cavicchia, C.) Sparse Scaling (Groenen, P.J.F. and Cavicchia, C.) A new distance function that combines numerical and categorical variables (van de Velden, M., Iodice D’Enza, A., Markos, A.
